column3: â€œGather children, let me tell you the story about SA. Sour Apple is that girl in your class who you didn't even know was in your class to begin with. She is plain, boring and doesn't seem to give a damn about anyone around her. You're at party and every hot girl there is either too good for you to approach her or you're scared of that buff guy around her who you think is her boyfriend. Life sucks now because your plan...â€

â€œVery Strong and Oh So Fruity! I have been using sour apple for a few months now and it's grown to be a nice strain that's made it's way onto my fave list.
The Bud: Super frosty as if these small dime shaped funky chunky looking nugs that are light green and have bright sherbert hairs; these are super dense to bust open, lots of cbg is released and the trichs on my finger tips aren't coming off. Dunked in the sugar bo...â€

â€œ10/7/15
Reviewer: GreenPeaceGlobal
Information: Sour Apple Strain
Quality: High End Mids
Location Grown: Central California
Growth date: June-August
Harvest: August-September
Use: Recreational/ Medicinal

Review: Strain felt like a hybrid. Left user in a state of energetic tendencies. User also felt like sticking to the couch various times. 

Device effects: 
Bong: Smoother as time went on. After three bowls inhalati...â€
â€œVery happy, euphoric strain. Reminiscent of Sour Diesel but I would say it's a bit more of a cerebral buzz. Very nice and very much a true hybrid feeling. Very heady but not energy-draining.â€

â€œSour Apple is a wonderful, gentle hybrid strain.  I'd like to categorize it as sativa-dominant, but there is a nice body component that develops in longer smoke sessions.  This strain's mental effects are on the quiet, introspective side of things.  Reflective and soft, rather than mentally energizing, Sour Apple is a great choice when needing a moment to think things through.  The relaxed body high that evolved as I...â€

â€œThis was one of the more expensive strains that I've bought. The great thing about sour apple is that you are very much aware of how high you are, so if you wanted to smoke and run some errands, you'd very easily be able to moderate yourself. Not to mention that after about 2 bowls, I was FLYING. Everything was hilarious, and there wasn't a single sad thought in my mind, even a few days after smoking (I go on toleran...â€

â€œSour apple is wonderful. I really only have to take one hit to feel great with this strain. This strain is gentle and it doesnâ€™t give you that â€œwow Iâ€™m definitely highâ€ feeling, but that can certainly be a good thing. Thatâ€™s why this strain is best for the nighttime. If you wanna just chill out and clear your mind. If you want to feel good all over this is the strain for you. After one hit I feel so relaxed and focus...â€

â€œThere have been some beautiful late harvest buds around the OC lately, busty and plump, with coatings of amber trichromes.  Sour Candy Apple has dark leaves and light emerald flowers, flush with pale hairs.  There is a fruit scent similar to an apple or pear.  Itâ€™s a bit piney also, but barely so.  The buds I got were really fresh, making them hard to break up.  Once they dried after a moment or two on a dish, they w...â€

â€œFirst thing you notice is how much it really does taste like sour apples. It has a sour, candy like inhale, and exhale is sour and even a little spicy. 
Terpene quality is through the roof. 

It feels like a good blend between Indica and Sativa; my face gets the tingly, melting feeling while im flying over skylines in my mind. But if it were anything, it leans towards the Indica side. 
Another user stated it already,...â€

â€œPain, and anxiety take a hike when you med up with this girl!! The terps are exquisite and smooth. Sweet and tangy on exhale, she tastes nice. Very good for a day time smoke as it gives you a bit of pep in your step. Definitely a new favorite!! Very good representation of a sativa dominant hybrid!!â€

â€œWith notes reminiscent to Granny Smith Apple, this cross of Sour Diesel and Cinderella 99, abolishes stress, provides plenty of pain relief, and gives a boost of energy, staying true to being to its sativa roots. 
You will be licking your lips after trying this strain. 

Vaporization recommend.â€

â€œThis strain doesn't hit hard like blue dream would, instead it is a very mellow, calming, and happy bud. I took a nice joint of this and went biking, and it was the most carefree and lovely trips I've had. At one point I laid down on a grassy hill and took a snapshot of the beautiful weather and surroundings, and laid there in the sun for a while until I got up and continued pleasantly biking. Tastes and even smells ...â€
â€œSour Apple is nice and smooth, great body high and nice happy head feel. Fuzzy and warm.â€
â€œI've been having a hard time finding one that works for my GAD and major depression. I feel wonderful. No stress and  happy. Just the way I like it.â€

â€œThe special of the day at Glisan Buds was Sour Apple for $10/gram.  It tested out at 24.4% THC and .4% CBD.  It's a 60/40 sativa leaning hybrid, and that is how it feels on me.  The nugs were super dense.

Sour Apple is tart, a real lip puckering, teeth freezing, uplifting apple smell and taste! How we have been able to breed this plant to get a specific flavor blows me away.  I know that some nutes enhance certain f...â€
â€œThis is a strain I can do without. For some reason the one I got did nothing for me . Didnt have a strong smell to it. Must have gotten a bad batch . Not something I will try again.â€
â€œI've been having a hard time finding one that works for my GAD and major depression. I feel wonderful. No stress and  happy. Just the way I like it.â€
â€œThis is a strain I can do without. For some reason the one I got did nothing for me . Didnt have a strong smell to it. Must have gotten a bad batch . Not something I will try again.â€

â€œFlavor train coming through!!! What a delicious smoke, nice bright fresh apple and lime notes on inhale and exhale. Light smoke no caugh. 

Started with quick body relaxation and numbing. Maintained relaxed body high with a quick burst of mental focus that quickly faded for a sleepy high. This strain calls you to bed and you won't want to fight it. What a great nights sleep! Don't miss this one but clear your schedul...â€

â€œInstantly felt after two strong smooth pulls! The effects are dreamy makes you feel like you have clouds under your body lol and I loved the taste as well has that candy effect and is sweet and smooth with a faint of purge in it to give you a kick in your chest!! Hope you guys enjoyed this as much as me !! Highly recommend for anyone wanting to feel a body high and relaxtion at its finest ğŸ‘ŒğŸ½ğŸ‘ğŸ½â€

â€œPotent bud. When I first saw it, it was in big dense buds. They were big and darkish purple and frosted wish crystals. It also smelled of apples/fruit. This bud is amazing it tastes and burns so good everything about it was enjoyable. It gives strong highs that creep up on you, and all of a sudden your baked as hell sittin there like holy shit. 

-J Man Coolâ€
â€œNice apple smell and good smoke but lacks that hit  ya in the head I'M HIGH,HIGH.â€

â€œSour Apple is a happy, giggly strain that will wow you with its smell and taste. Great for insomnia, but if you're not an insomniac you might be turned off a bit by its tendency to put you to sleep a few hours after smoking - nothing that can't be fought off with food and loud music, of course. Very solid strain overall.â€

â€œInstantly felt after two strong smooth pulls! â€œThis strain can be deceiving. For me it either left me energetic or glued to the couch. Steamroller use with this strain can pack a punch. Bong use after considerable amount of bowls will feel smoother each hit. Slight headband feel nukes will go off in your head". Hunger does become onset towards the end of the high. Can make you feel immobile at times. Recommended storage is a mason jar with a pc. of tissue at the...â€"

â€œI'm surprised how much this stuff actually tastes like it's name suggests. That signature sour diesel taste is balanced by apples on the exhale. This strains smell is a mixture between high quality herb/apples/sour diesel.

Sour Apple is relaxing without being sedating; clearheaded but not due to low potency; the high this strain provides reminds me of how all the best psychedelics come in waves... At times, the into...â€
â€œFor sure sativa and taste the hints of diesel ..this may just be another one of my favorites! (No lighters to my flower only HempWick)â€

The high was very subtle, it's a great early morning strain, I'd roll over, take a toke, my headache would subside, and I could rest another 30-40 minutes. That being said, it didn't seem very strong. I was using a brass knuckles cartridge tested at 66%, but I could barely feel anything, I had to use almost .3g of the cart to ge...â€

â€œDELICIOUS.  Oh my goodness!!  I could smoke an ounce of this and not realize because it's just so dang tasty!  Which is good because it takes more than average to get medicated.  Not quite as strong as ever advertised.  That being said, no anxiety, no panics, and pleasant overall feel consistently.  Very good for PTSD.â€
â€œPerfect post work. First up then down. Nice reset button for the day.â€

â€œWow. Perfectly cured, potent, long lasting and so tasty.  When I run the smoke through my sinuses I can taste honeysuckle.  This is a new favourite.  Great relaxing body buzz with an energetic uplifting head high.  Great for sex. Perfect blend for getting things done. Smoking too much can give me a mild headache.â€

â€œSmells lightly like Granny Smith Apples, this doesn't carry over to the taste, atleast not my batch.  Tastes were sour and slight pineapple on the exhale. Women, if you are into yoga, this is a good pre session sacrament to get your esoteric juices flowingâ€
